description: This resource schema represents the NotificationChannel resource in the Amazon DevOps Guru.

NotificationChannelConfig.description: Information about notification channels you have configured with DevOps Guru.
NotificationChannelConfig.markdownDescription:
Information about notification channels you have configured with DevOps Guru.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SnsChannelConfig.description: Information about a notification channel configured in DevOps Guru to send notifications when insights are created.

TopicArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[a-z0-9-]*:sns:[a-z0-9-]+:\d{12}:[^:]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

SnsChannelConfig.markdownDescription:
Information about a notification channel configured in DevOps Guru to send notifications when insights are created.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

NotificationFilterConfig.description: Information about filters of a notification channel configured in DevOpsGuru to filter for insights.
NotificationFilterConfig.markdownDescription:
Information about filters of a notification channel configured in DevOpsGuru to filter for insights.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InsightSeverity.markdownDescription:
DevOps Guru Insight Severity Enum

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: LOW | MEDIUM | HIGH  
Update requires: No interruption

NotificationMessageType.markdownDescription:
DevOps Guru NotificationMessageType Enum

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NEW_INSIGHT | CLOSED_INSIGHT | NEW_ASSOCIATION | SEVERITY_UPGRADED | NEW_RECOMMENDATION  
Update requires: No interruption

InsightSeveritiesFilterList.description: DevOps Guru insight severities to filter for
InsightSeveritiesFilterList.markdownDescription:
DevOps Guru insight severities to filter for

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

NotificationMessageTypesFilterList.description: DevOps Guru message types to filter for
NotificationMessageTypesFilterList.markdownDescription:
DevOps Guru message types to filter for

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: The ID of a notification channel.
Id.markdownDescription:
The ID of a notification channel.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: ^[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption
